Uses of Class
chess.Piece

    • Uses of Piece in chess

      Methods in chess with parameters of type Piece 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void Chess.ChessBoardPrint​(Piece[][] chessBoard)
      Prints out the state of the chessboard after each successful move of a chess Piece.
      static int Chess.MakeMove​(Piece[][] chessBoard, boolean turn, java.lang.String input, int drawOffered)
      Takes in user input and moves piece relative to input.
      abstract boolean Piece.move​(Piece[][] chessBoard, int[] oPos, int[] nPos, Piece[] killedPiece)
      general move method which evaluates the move to see if it is an valid move for the Peice and if it is excutes it.
      static void Chess.SetChessBoard​(Piece[][] chessBoard)
      Sets the Chessboard at the start of the game with the standard game set up
